body.name: EverSnug Adjustable Layer Pillows for Sleeping - Set of 2, Cooling, Luxury Pillows for Back, Stomach or Side Sleepers (Standard (Pack of 2))
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 10 mins
features: THE PERFECT PILLOW FOR EVERY TYPE OF SLEEPER: Forget never having a good night’s sleep because you can’t find the right pillow for you. No matter if you are a side, front or back sleeper, the patent pending EverSnug adjustable layer pillow can be tailored exactly to your sleeping needs through our innovative adjustable layer design.

THE BEST NIGHT SLEEP YOU'VE EVER HAD: Bring the 5 star hotel sleeping experience right into your home, and experience the feeling of sleeping on a cloud. Whether you prefer soft or firm pillows, high or thin pillows, the EverSnug pillow can be tailored exactly to get you the perfect nights sleep.

STAY COOL NO MORE OVERHEATING: Our premium satin striped 250-thread count cover and our carefully crafted alternative down filling, keeps you cool even on the warmest of nights. No more night sweats, our ultra-breathable and cooling pillow will be a welcome relief.

UNMATCHED QUALITY: Our pillows are made with the most luxurious of materials available and are OKEO-TEX 100 certified, ensuring that our textiles meet high safety and environmental standards. Our pillows are designed to make life as easy as counting sheep, simply pop them in the washer and they are good as new!

THE EVERSNUG PROMISE: We at EverSnug stand behind our products with the greatest confidence that you, our customer will love our products just as much as we do. However, if for any reason you did not fall in love with your product, we have your back by providing a 100% love it or your money back guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy and adjustable!
reviews.reviewText: I've been waking up with neck pain for over the last year. After researching and looking at hundreds of different pillows I finally got these. They're amazing. No more neck pain. They're just fluffy enough without making me feel like I'm suffocating in a pillow. The fact that they're adjustable makes them perfect for if I need more or less. Absolutely no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased pillows like this before and loved them but not the price. I'm moving and thought "new everything" and decided to give these a shot. I'm glad I did. I got the king size. Perfect! I like more of a fluffy pillow & my love likes a more flat pillow. These are perfect to get the right fit without buying multiple pillows. The casing is durable and the inserts are ideal for getting the right comfort level. AND conducive to a great night's sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft. Good customization choice.
reviews.reviewText: I like thinner pillows that are soft and this does the job so well. Easy for me and my partner to choose our own thickness each day depending on what way we intend to sleep and if we have neck pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finally found my pillow m!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had a hard time finding a slim, soft pillow. So glad I finally found this one, it’s just what I’ve been looking for. It’s very soft and you can adjust the thickness. Be sure to air it out for 24 hours, I missed that in the instructions when I first read it and noticed a slight odor the first night. The only reason I didn’t give five stars is because the zipped casing that holds the layers is also filled. It says it’s washable but I know if I put it in the washer it’s going to mess up the filling so I’ll instead just buy a pillow cover to go over that. Otherwise, it’s a good pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many pillows that I am always afraid to try to find ones that will really work for me.I'm glad to say that this purchased worked out very well. I am quite pleased. Very soft....and for me, removing one insert did the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For Stomach or Side Sleepers
reviews.reviewText: The case with one insert is so soft my head sunk all the way to the bed. Zero support to just lay on. But as a stomach sleeper I squash my pillow where I want it and it can’t be high so that first night wasn’t awful. I ended up putting all inserts in the case. Sometimes on my stomach that’s a wee bit too high and hurts my neck. But on my side it’s great. If I end up in my back it’s not the best but it’s okay. If you love down pillows and are trying for a hypoallergenic replacement these are pretty good. I don’t believe anyone will want the pillow with less than two of the three inserts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love for stomach/side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I was nervous about finding soft enough (but still supportive) pillows for myself and my partner, both mainly stomach sleepers. They are very fluffy and full but squish down with weight, I kept all the filling in one and took 1 cushion out of the other. Full is perfect for me, and 1 cushion out is perfect for my boyfriend. These are definitely more on the cushy side, not too firm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows as a back up pair but since putting them on the bed, I cannot believe the softness and support we are getting. My partner is a side sleeper and says they are the best pillows he's slept on. I am a back sleeper and with the removal on one insert, my neck pain has gone and I'm sleeping so much better. These pillows are soft and comfy. I'm getting another set as my back up!!
Il est crémeux aucune amertume trop puissante je déguste ce café tous les jours et je ne m’en lasse jamais merci

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Pillow but DO NOT MACHINE WASH!
reviews.reviewText: Very novel idea for people who like to vary pillow thickness. My wife likes a thinner pillow than I do so this pair was a great choice. However, the tag says machine wash gentle, and I like to wash all new items before using so I did. BIG MISTAKE. The insides of the pillow clumped up into blobs of lumpiness. Still reasonably comfortable though. No returns because it's a marketplace seller.

The media could not be loaded. This pillow is completely flat in the middle where I lay my head after 2 weeks of use . The actual pillow itself is flat- there is no filling. The inserts inside of the pillow that make it adjustable are made with the same material for the large pillow they’re flat in the middle as well. I wake up 2-3 times a night readjusting. This pillow has caused my extreme pain in my neck and back.The filling is the same filling in your cheap Walmart/ikea pillows. In fact you can probably make this yourself for 15 -20 dollars. ISleep on my stomach so my neck needs support. This can’t be possible if the pillow is flat to the point I’m sleeping on the fabric lining of the pillow. Very disappointed would like a refund.
